hi guys: serious, how can i connect a sharefolder in ubuntu to windows?

Yes.  Try just going to Nautilus and enter smb://name_of_the_windows_pc and see what happens -- if you're lucky it'll display the share names, you'll be able to click on those to open them, etc.
Oh, hit Ctrl+L in Nautilus to get an editable address bar
